oracle.pg.text.lucene

Class OracleIndexWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriter
      • oracle.pg.text.lucene.OracleIndexWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, org.apache.lucene.index.TwoPhaseCommit, org.apache.lucene.util.Accountable

    public class OracleIndexWriter
extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriter
    This class extends Lucene IndexWriter. It has logic to control commit operations based on the number of documents indexed.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriter

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Increments the number of documents indexed by this object

      Gets the current number of documents indexed using this object

      Verifies if a commit of the index is required as the number of documents indexed matches the commit size

      Verifies if there are documents that have not been commited

    • Constructor Detail

      • OracleIndexWriter

        public OracleIndexWriter(org.apache.lucene.store.Directory directory,
                         org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriterConfig config)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new OracleIndexWriter from a given directory and configuration
        Parameters:
        directory - a Directory object where the index is stored.
        config - an IndexWriterConfig object denoting the index configuration such as buffer size, etc.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • OracleIndexWriter

        public OracleIndexWriter(org.apache.lucene.store.Directory directory,
                         org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriterConfig config,
                         int commitBatchSize)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new OracleIndexWriter from a given directory and configuration
        Parameters:
        directory - a Directory object where the index is stored.
        config - an IndexWriterConfig object denoting the index configuration such as buffer size, etc.
        commitBatchSize - a positive integer denoting the number of documents to index before forcing a commit over the Lucene index.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Increments the number of documents indexed by this object

        Gets the current number of documents indexed using this object

        public boolean isCommitRequired()
        Verifies if a commit of the index is required as the number of documents indexed matches the commit size

        public boolean isDataUncommited()
        Verifies if there are documents that have not been commited

        public void setIndexedDocs(long number)
        Sets the number of documents indexed by this object to the given number
